description: Whenever I visit @Naya_Raipur it welcomes me with a new surprise every time: PM @narendramodi#PMVisitsCG @PMOIndia — CMO Chhattisgarh (@ChhattisgarhCMO) February 21, 2016 Elderly lady of 104 years...she does not watch TV or read papers. But message of building toilets reached her & she went on to do…
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Launched Shyama Prasad Mukherji National Rurban Mission. Rurban combines best of villages & cities. Soul of a village will be preserved & villages will get best facilities associated with cities.
http://nm-4.com/vepg
